Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>聖獣<White>は<Yellow>ヒト<White>には不干渉なんだろう？ いいのか、オレたちについてきて。
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't the <Cyan>Sacred Beasts<White> not supposed to interfere with <Yellow>Mankind<White>? Is it really all right for you to accompany us?

Entry.JapaneseText: 言ったでしょ？ ぼくは<Yellow>ヒト<White>が好きだから。
Entry.EnglishText: Didn't I tell you before? I like <Yellow>Humans<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ぼくはキミたちの「翼」になるだけ。 行きたい場所はキミたちで決めるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: But, I'm only going to serve as your wings. Wherever you want to go is up to you.
